title: Fix: Mistral model broken due to config key case mismatch
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Restored full availability for the Mistral text model by resolving a configuration mismatch.
gist.impact: Ensures reliable text generation responses when selecting the Mistral model.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee acting as a tiny mechanic, reconnecting a disconnected cable labeled 'Mistral' to a server rack. Represents fixing the connection/configuration.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic reconnecting a glowing cable to a server rack labeled 'MISTRAL'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'ONLINE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mechanic reconnecting a glowing cable to a server rack labeled 'MISTRAL'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'ONLINE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
